Which AWS service or feature can the company use to meet these requirements?

Selected Answer: D
D. Amazon Identity and Access Management (IAM)
 
AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) roles provide a way to access AWS by relying on temporary security credentials. Each role has a set of permissions for making AWS service requests, and a role is not associated with a specific user or group.

questions.question_text: Which statement describes a characteristic of the AWS global infrastructure?

discussion.content:
Correct answer is C. Availability Zones contain multiple data centers.

 Here's why:

A. Edge locations contain multiple AWS Regions: This is incorrect. Edge locations (also known as Outposts or Local Zones) are smaller deployments closer to specific customer populations and don't contain entire Regions.
B. AWS Regions contain multiple Regional edge caches: This is also incorrect. Regions primarily consist of Availability Zones, not edge caches. Edge caches are typically distributed throughout specific regions, not contained within them.
C. Availability Zones contain multiple data centers: This is correct. Each Availability Zone (AZ) is made up of several physically separate data centers with redundant power, networking, and connectivity. This redundancy ensures high availability and fault tolerance for your applications.
D. Each data center contains multiple edge locations: This is inaccurate. Data centers are part of Availability Zones, while edge locations are smaller, geographically dispersed deployments. One data center wouldn't hold multiple edge locations.

Selected Answer: C
C. Availability Zones contain multiple data centers 
others are more wrong. C is only ambiguous

Selected Answer: C
C. Availability Zones contain multiple data centers

is this correct? "Availability Zones contain multiple data centers"
> "An Availability Zone (AZ) is one or more discrete data centers with redundant power, networking, and connectivity in an AWS Region."
it could be just one datacenter not multiple

Selected Answer: C
C is the answer.

"An Availability Zone (AZ) is one or more discrete data centers with redundant power, networking, and connectivity in an AWS Region."
https://aws.amazon.com/about-aws/global-infrastructure/regions_az/
So how come AZs (always) contain multiple DCs?

choices.A: Edge locations contain multiple AWS Regions
choices.D: Each data center contains multiple edge locations
choices.B: AWS Regions contain multiple Regional edge caches
choices.C: Availability Zones contain multiple data centers

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. AWS Artifact

"AWS Artifact, available in the console, is a self-service audit artifact retrieval portal that provides our customers with on-demand access to AWSâ€™ compliance documentation and AWS agreements.
You can use AWS Artifact Reports to download AWS security and compliance documents, such as AWS ISO certifications, Payment Card Industry (PCI), and System and Organization Control (SOC) reports."

https://aws.amazon.com/artifact/faq/

Selected Answer: B
The service that the company can use to access AWS compliance documentation is AWS Artifact (Option B).

AWS Artifact is a service that provides on-demand access to AWS compliance documentation, including PCI compliance documentation. It offers several types of compliance reports, including PCI Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) reports, which help companies understand how AWS meets the PCI DSS requirements. Companies can use AWS Artifact to download these reports and provide them to auditors as evidence of compliance with industry standards.

Selected Answer: B
B is the answer.

choices.B: AWS Support will contact the company to set up standard service charges.
choices.D: The company's AWS account will be frozen and can be restarted after a payment plan is established.
choices.A: The company will be charged the standard pay-as-you-go service rates for the usage that exceeds the Free Tier usage.
choices.C: The company will be charged for the services it consumed during the Free Tier period, plus additional charges for service consumption after the Free Tier period.

questions.question_text:
A company is using the AWS Free Tier for several AWS services for an application.
What will happen if the Free Tier usage period expires or if the application use exceeds the Free Tier usage limits?
Which AWS service can a company use to perform complex analytical queries?

discussion.content: END OF THE FREE-TIER, ATB GUYS.

Selected Answer: C
C. Amazon Redshift

"Tens of thousands of customers today rely on Amazon Redshift to analyze exabytes of data and run complex analytical queries, making it a widely used cloud data warehouse. Run and scale analytics in seconds on all your data without having to manage your data warehouse infrastructure."

https://aws.amazon.com/redshift/
C. Amazon Redshift

Selected Answer: C
https://aws.amazon.com/redshift/features/

Selected Answer: C
redshift is correct

C. Amazon Redshift

Amazon Redshift is a fully-managed, cloud-based data warehousing service that is designed for handling large-scale, complex analytical queries. It is optimized for querying and analyzing structured and semi-structured data using SQL, making it an excellent choice for companies that need to perform complex analytical queries.

Selected Answer: C
C is the answer.
